dct_description_sm: Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Indexes: Index in Palestinam Iacobi Ziegleri; Elenchus quo libro et capite bibliorum & quoties, singulia Palestinæ loci continentur.
First 4 and last 4 pages blank (included in page description).

"Terrae Sanctae altera descriptio, IVXTA ordinem alphabeti, quæad Scripturam proxime directa est, utilissima etiam plebeio lectori, authore Vuolffgango Vueissenburgio pridem Academiæ Basiliensis Mathematico. ; Index, totius operis locupletissimus qui in priori æditione desyderabatur. ; Elenchus, quo libro & capite Bibliorum, & quoties, singuli Palaestinae loci continentur" on title page.
Maps appear together at end; "Tabula continet" [i.e. Table of contents] and descriptive text appear on preceding versos.
Maps show topography (in bird's eye view), vegetation, waterways, ports.
Sea monsters, elaborate representations of water.
Map 5 has compass rose, diagonal lines with labels such as "Babylon XIII" and "Roma XXVII."
Map 6 includes Nile River Delta and Valley.
Map 7 features pictorial representation of encampment with figures (including horsemen).
